text:
WorldGaming | Toronto, ONT Canada | Full-time Onsite

WorldGaming is the premier destination for the community of eSports enthusiasts and competitive gamers to meet, watch, challenge and play in head-to-head matches and tournaments for cash and prizes. We offers robust community features with a variety of tournament formats such as brackets, team play and leaderboards. We are all gamers here!

https://worldgaming.com
